trans-unit.source: Gets the result of evaluating an automatic scaling formula on the pool.
trans-unit.target: Gets the result of evaluating an automatic scaling formula on the pool.

trans-unit.source: This API is primarily for validating an autoscale formula, as it simply returns the result to the client without applying the formula to the pool.
trans-unit.target: This API is primarily for validating an autoscale formula, as it simply returns the result to the client without applying the formula to the pool.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to pools.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to pools.

trans-unit.source: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool on which you want to evaluate an automatic scaling formula.
trans-unit.target: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool on which you want to evaluate an automatic scaling formula.

trans-unit.source: Automatic scaling must be enabled on the pool to evaluate a formula.
trans-unit.target: Automatic scaling must be enabled on the pool to evaluate a formula.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1ac3653-0840-45cd-a682-f1f51566a6cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Enable automatic scaling on a pool</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1ac3653-0840-45cd-a682-f1f51566a6cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Enable automatic scaling on a pool</link>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a request body that could be used when automatic scaling is enabled.
trans-unit.target: The following example shows a request body that could be used when automatic scaling is enabled.

trans-unit.source: The formula increases the number of nodes that are used by 10% when the CPU usage in the pool for past 10 minutes stays over 70%.
trans-unit.target: The formula increases the number of nodes that are used by 10% when the CPU usage in the pool for past 10 minutes stays over 70%.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a formula for the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a formula for the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.

trans-unit.source: The formula is validated and its results calculated, but is not applied to the pool.
trans-unit.target: The formula is validated and its results calculated, but is not applied to the pool.

trans-unit.source: To apply the formula to the pool, use <link xlink:href="a1ac3653-0840-45cd-a682-f1f51566a6cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Enable automatic scaling on a pool</link>.
trans-unit.target: To apply the formula to the pool, use <link xlink:href="a1ac3653-0840-45cd-a682-f1f51566a6cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Enable automatic scaling on a pool</link>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying this formula, see <externalLink><linkText>Automatically scale compute nodes in an Azure Batch pool</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn820182.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about specifying this formula, see <externalLink><linkText>Automatically scale compute nodes in an Azure Batch pool</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn820182.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: The previous example shows a typical error that occurs when data cannot be obtained from the pool.
trans-unit.target: The previous example shows a typical error that occurs when data cannot be obtained from the pool.

trans-unit.source: The time at which the autoscale formula was evaluated
trans-unit.target: The time at which the autoscale formula was evaluated

trans-unit.source: The final values of all variables used in the autoscale formula.
trans-unit.target: The final values of all variables used in the autoscale formula.

trans-unit.source: Each variable value is returned in the form $<legacyItalic>variable=value</legacyItalic>, and variables are separated by semicolons.
trans-unit.target: Each variable value is returned in the form $<legacyItalic>variable=value</legacyItalic>, and variables are separated by semicolons.

trans-unit.source: Contains details of the error encountered evaluating the autoscale formula on the pool, if evaluation was unsuccessful
trans-unit.target: Contains details of the error encountered evaluating the autoscale formula on the pool, if evaluation was unsuccessful
